mapper.insert: insert into trip_list(trip_list_serial, member_id, trip_name, days_count, start_date, end_date, trip_auth, trip_date) values(seq_trip_list.nextval, #{member_id}, #{trip_name}, ${days_count}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, ${trip_auth}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select trip_list_serial, member_id, trip_name, days_count, to_char(start_date,'rrrr/mm/dd') start_date, to_char(end_date,'rrrr/mm/dd') end_date, trip_auth, trip_date from trip_list order by trip_date desc
